definitions.definition: One who or that which kills .
examples: There’s a killer on the loose.
My cat is a habitual bird killer .
Carbon monoxide is a silent killer .

definitions.definition: That which causes stress or is extremely difficult , especially that which may cause failure at a task.
examples: The final hill in the race course was a killer .

definitions.definition: Something that is so far ahead of its competition that it effectively kills off that competition.
examples: Digital streaming platforms are CD killers .

definitions.definition: A remarkably impressive person or thing.
A knockout form of darts or pool involving several players.
A club used for killing fish .
A particularly heavy type of handstamp , or portion of one, often obscuring a large part of the postage stamp .
Synonym of virama ( “ kind of diacritical mark ” ) .

main_definition: One who or that which kills .
secondary_definitions: ( figuratively ) That which causes stress or is extremely difficult , especially that which may cause failure at a task.
( figuratively ) Something that is so far ahead of its competition that it effectively kills off that competition.
( figuratively ) A remarkably impressive person or thing.
( sports , uncountable ) A knockout form of darts or pool involving several players.
A club used for killing fish .
( philately ) A particularly heavy type of handstamp , or portion of one, often obscuring a large part of the postage stamp .
Synonym of virama ( “ kind of diacritical mark ” ) .
